title: Finish the Puzzle: Querying Power BI Semantic Models with Semantic Link!
excerpt: Want to use notebooks to leverage data from a Power BI semantic model (dataset)? Maybe you're a data scientist wanting to augment your models with that data, or maybe you just want to validate stuff as a Power BI developer. Semantic Link (or Sempy) can help!  Sample Notebook: https://github.com/guyinacube/demo-files/blob/master/video%20demos/Synapse/20231019%20-%20Sempy.ipynb
